detectors.description:
AMPT._writeCheckpoint(address,uint32,uint96,uint96) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AMPT.sol#268-279) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- nCheckpoints > 0 && checkpoints[delegatee][nCheckpoints - 1].fromBlock == blockNumber (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AMPT.sol#271)
detectors.markdown:
[AMPT._writeCheckpoint(address,uint32,uint96,uint96)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AMPT.sol#L268-L279) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- [nCheckpoints > 0 && checkpoints[delegatee][nCheckpoints - 1].fromBlock == blockNumber](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AMPT.sol#L271)

detectors.description:
AMPT.delegateBySig(address,uint256,uint256,uint8,bytes32,bytes32) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AMPT.sol#167-176) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(now <= expiry,AMPT::delegateBySig: signature expired) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AMPT.sol#174)
detectors.markdown:
[AMPT.delegateBySig(address,uint256,uint256,uint8,bytes32,bytes32)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AMPT.sol#L167-L176) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- [require(bool,string)(now <= expiry,AMPT::delegateBySig: signature expired)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AMPT.sol#L174)

detectors.description: Pragma version^0.6.12 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AMPT.sol#6) necessitates a version too recent to be trusted. Consider deploying with 0.6.11
detectors.markdown: Pragma version[^0.6.12](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AMPT.sol#L6) necessitates a version too recent to be trusted. Consider deploying with 0.6.11

detectors.description: Constant AMPT.totalSupply (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AMPT.sol#21) is not in UPPER_CASE_WITH_UNDERSCORES

AMPT.slitherConstructorConstantVariables() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AMPT.sol#10-307) uses literals with too many digits:
	- totalSupply = 100000000e18 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AMPT.sol#21)
detectors.markdown:
[AMPT.slitherConstructorConstantVariables()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AMPT.sol#L10-L307) uses literals with too many digits:

detectors.description:
delegate(address) should be declared external:
